title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
content: Quote from: Useful LinksFacebook | Twitter | LinkedIn | Telegram | Discord | Instagram | Reddit | Website1 FIX =$0.15 (Pre-sale price)Contract detailsCode:0x6BfB050a9Bec446a6A7BF49558f81DC8721248F1Management team will distribute the token.Duration - 4 weeksPlease check the next posts for weekly report forms.Total Token Allocation for Bounty program : 500,000 FIXToken Distribution Starts: Two weeks after the bounty ends.Bounty week: Sunday to Saturday One day before each bounty week, I will post a link of a Google form to submit the reports of your bounty tasks.You must fill up and submit the report from in order to get paid for the given week. Â  Â Public Master Spreadsheet Â  Â Be creative, do not spamA good way to be creative to study the project, understand the ecosystem and the industry.It will allow you to write good contents on social media.General Rules1. Mandatory task:Follow Twitter account https://twitter.com/finxbitJoin Telegram Channel https://t.me/finxbitokenFollow Instagram account https://www.instagram.com/finxbit/2. You can not remove any work until the final payment has cleared3. I and the FINXBIT management have the full right to disqualify, deny or cancel any participant.4. Please do not use foul language, image, NSFW contents. Do Not Cheat5. Provide BEP20 address to get paid. Address must not be from any exchange or custodial wallet.6. Post #Proof of Registration to join a campaign is required7. You must join Bounty Hunters group for bounty related informationNo fake Twitter account, please. Set your privacy setting public. Twitter Audit score must be over 80% and not more than three months old.1. Follow official Twitter: https://twitter.com/finxbit2. Minimum 3 reply with 3 Likes on three different tweets of official Twitter. Not more than one a day.3. Minimum 3 quote tweet (using some hashtags, not all at once from below) for three different tweets from official Twitter. Not more than one a day.Hashtags: #FinXCoin #Web3 #ICO #NewToken #Crypto #Blockchain4. Submit report (Link of the retweets, reply and likes) when the Google Report Form is live each week.Â Rewards200- 500 Followers: 0.50 stakes per week501-2,000 Followers: 1.00 stake per week2001-5,000 Followers: 2.00 stakes per week5,001-10,000 Followers: 4.00 stakes per week10,001+ Followers: 6.00 stakes per week(Individual weekly cap 660 FIX)Â  Â  Â  Apply to join Twitter Bounty Â  Â  No fake Facebook profile and profile picture can not be locked. 1. Follow and like official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/fixcoin2. Minimum 3 comment with 3 reactions (Love, care, like) on three different posts of official Facebook. Not more than one a day.3. Minimum 3 shares with on-topic comments using few hashtags from below, for three different post from official Facebook. Not more than one a day.Hashtags: #FinXCoin #Web3 #ICO #NewToken #Crypto #Blockchain4. Submit report (Link of the share, comment) when the Google Report Form is live each week.Â Rewards150-1,000 Followers: 1.00 stakes per week1,001-3,000 Followers: 2.50 stake per week3,001-5,000 Followers: 3.00 stakes per week(Individual weekly cap 660 FIX)Â  Â  Â  Apply to join Facebook Bounty Â  Â  1. Follow Instagram account: https://www.instagram.com/finxbit/2. Like, share and comment on at-least 3 contents from official Instagram page each week3. Submit report when the Google Report Form is live each week.Â Rewards200- 500 Followers: 0.50 stakes per week501-2,000 Followers: 1.00 stake per week2001-5,000 Followers: 2.00 stakes per week5,001-10,000 Followers: 4.00 stakes per week10,001+ Followers: 6.00 stakes per week(Individual weekly cap 550 FIX)Â  Â  Â  Apply to join Instagram Bounty Â  Â  1. Follow/connect LinkedIn account: https://www.linkedin.com/company/fixcoin/2. Like, share and comment on at-least 3 contents from official LinkedIn page each week3. Submit report when the Google Report Form is live each week.Â Rewards200- 500 Connections: 0.50 stakes per week501-2,000 Connections: 1.00 stake per week2001-5,000+ Connections: 2.00 stakes per week(Individual weekly cap 550 FIX)Â  Â  Â  Apply to join LinkedIn Bounty Â  Â  Join Reddit channel, Mandatory task #1 Join Discord, Mandatory task #21. Write a minimum 1,000 words article and publish it on any of the following platforms:Medium, Quora, publish0x, Reddit, Steemit or your own blog only.Guidelines for blog post- Include at least two images which go very well with the article- Include the website URL as a hyperlink in the article body. Also include all social handles as hyperlinks too at least once.- Use the following hashtags in the article body.Spread out the hashtags to make them meaningful and readable.Hashtags: #FinXCoin #Web3 #ICO #NewToken #Crypto #Blockchain- A minimum 1 internal link to the blog you wrote- A minimum 1 external link to https://finxbit.com- Not more than 5 blog posts for one individual. One blog in one platform.- Add Proof of Authentication post URL at the bottom of the article to prove ownership.- Mention the focus keyword you used in the blog post2. To receive rewards, once job done - you must fill up the Google Form below, which contains both registration and report.RewardsDepending on the quality and engagement: Up to 15 Stakes(Individual cap: 1,500 FIX)Â  Â  Â  Â Apply and report Blog Bounty Â  Â  Â Subscribing official YouTube Channel is mandatory task # 1.Make a constructive comment, like and share the official video (click here to watch) on social platform. mandatory task # 2.1. Create a video of minimum 5 minutes length (must be original) and publish it on YouTubeGuidelines for video- Only English Voice-over will be accepted- The video shall be unique and interesting, shot (narrated) in the first person, and contain a story about the userâ€™sexperience. Video content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, pre-sale, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.- Video description must contains: Hashtags #FinXCoin #Web3 #ICO #NewToken #Crypto #BlockchainLinks: https://www.finxbit.com/ and https://t.me/finxbitoken- Video must be published on a Crypto related YouTube channel with minimum 1,000 subscribers- Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. - Video created with mobile devices and bot voices will not be rewarded. - Videos that do not have a human voice-over will only receive half the bounty. - There will be slim considerations for good quality animation video with bot voices. - Sound and video quality must be high, although webcam and smartphone videos are accepted.- During the bounty campaign, 1 (one) participant can submit only 1 (one) work.- High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.- Published video description must include a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Telegram Chanel, Twitter page,YouTube channel or any other social media.- Request visitors to check video- Request visitors to visit the URL: www.finxbit.com (loud and clear voice pronounce w w w dot f i n x b i t dot c o m)2. To receive rewards, once job done - you must fill up the Google Form below, which contains both registration and report.RewardsDepending on the quality and engagement: Up to 15 Stakes(Individual cap: 2,300 FIX)Â  Â  Â  Apply and report Video Bounty Â  Â  ðŸ“£This campaign is designed and managed by:Disclaimer: We would like to make it clear that ðŸ’¹ðŸ“ˆ Bitcointalk Campaign Management ðŸ’ªðŸ”¥ Signature & Bounty, managed by Bitcointalk member Royse777, is an independent entity and is not directly affiliated with any of the crypto startups we advertise. While we strive to promote these startups in the best possible light, our views and opinions expressed in our advertising materials do not necessarily reflect those of the startups themselves. We work with various clients across the crypto industry, and our goal is to provide high-quality advertising services to help them achieve their marketing objectives.
